```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F, warning = F)
```

```{r}
# packages ----
if (!require(librarian)){
  install.packages("librarian")
  library(librarian)
}
shelf(
  dplyr, glue, highcharter, readr)

if (!is.na(params$csv)){
  d <- read_csv(
    params$csv, 
    skip      = 3, 
    col_names = c("year", "value")) %>% 
    arrange(year)

  d %>%
    hchart(
      "line", 
      hcaes(x = year, y = value))
}
```
